name: Australia Post WooCommerce Extension
author: WPRuby

sections.description:
Australia Post WooCommerce Extension is a WordPress Plugin that integrate the Australia Post service, it will calculate the shipping cost and the delivery time for your customer.

  • The plugin supports Regular Post and Express Post (Own Packaging).
  • The plugin supports Shipping Delivery Time.
  • The plugin supports The new Shipping Zones which introduced in WooCommerce 2.6.0
  • Upgrade to Pro Now
  • Documentation

Pro Features

Domestic Shipping

All the domestic shipping options are supported: Regular Post, Express Post and Courier Post. You can anytime, disable/enable one or all of these options.

Default Size and Weight

In case you don’t want to add weight and dimensions for all of the products you have or even you missed adding this information to one of them. The plugin allows you to set a default weight and dimensions of your product in case of the product’s information are missing.

Debug Mode

The debug mode is an excellent tool to test out the plugin’s settings and shipping prices as the plugin will be only activated for you. Also, it will display debugging information at the checkout page if the Debug Mode is enabled.

Delivery Time

Give your Cart/Checkout pages a professional aspect by displaying an estimation of the delivery time.

International Shipping

A wide range of international shipping options are supported:

  • Economy Air
  • Economy Sea
  • Standard International
  • Express International
  • Courier International

Custom Boxes

I bet you that you want to give your customers the most accurate shipping price. That’s why we have the feature of Custom Boxes, where you can add all of your shipping boxes information. Then the plugin will use this information to calculate the most accurate shipping price.

Custom Titles

We are eager to grant our customers the maximum options for customizations, other than adding your own shipping boxes, you can even rename every shipping option title to be displayed on the Cart/Checkout pages.

Shipping Tracking

Give your customers a peace of mind by providing the Australia Post tracking number on the order page. Then a shipping tracking link will be created at their account and also will be included in the order emails.

Prepaid Domestic Shipping

Domestic satchels make sending easy, giving you a fixed price upfront so you’ll always know your postage costs.

Regular Post

  • Small Satchel (500g)
  • Medium Satchel (3kg)
  • Large Satchel (5kg)

Express Post

  • Small Satchel (500g)
  • Medium Satchel (3kg)
  • Large Satchel (5kg)

Courier Post

  • Medium Satchel (3kg)

Letters Shipping

If you sell small-sized items, you can always enable the letters option to save your customers high shipping prices and increase sales. Supported letters options:

  • Domestic Letters Options
    • Regular Small Letter
    • Regular Large Letter
    • Regular Large Light Letter
    • Regular Large Medium Letter
    • Regular Large Heavy Letter
    • Express Post Small Envelope
    • Express Post Medium Letter
    • Express Post Large Envelope
    • Priority Small Letter
    • Priority Large Light Letter
    • Priority Large Medium Letter
    • Priority Large Heavy Letter
  • International Letters Options
    • Standard Letter
    • Express Letter
    • Courier Letter
    • Registered Small Letter
    • Registered Large Letter
    • Registered Small Envelope
    • Registered Large Envelope
    • Economy Air Light Letter
    • Economy Air Medium Letter
    • Economy Air Heavy Letter

Courier Shipping

As it was mentioned before, the plugin supports Courier shipping and prepaid courier satchels in case you need to deliver your product at the same day. Keep in mind that the courier network is available from metropolitan to metropolitan locations.

Handling Fees and Discounts

If either you need to add a handling fees for your shipping order, or if you want to reduce the shipping costs for your customers. We set an option for that where you can add an amount value to reduce or increase the shipping cost. The value can be either a number or a percentage, positive for handling fees and negative for discounts.

Extra Cover

Here is another feature to give you or your customers a peace of mind. You can enable the Extra Cover option in case your item’s lost or damaged in transition, you should be qualified for compensation.

Signature on Delivery

You want to make sure that your package was delivered to the right person? No problem. Just enable the Signature on Delivery option.

Separate Extra Services

Awesome. Another customizing option. Sometimes you want your customers to have the option whether they want Extra Cover or Signature on Delivery with their order. You only need to enable this option. But keep in mind to also enable Extra Cover or Signature on Delivery.

Display the Cheapest options

Cut to the Chase and provide the cheapest option to your customers without putting them in the hustle of choosing from many options.

  • Upgrade to Pro Now
  • Documentation
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for ‘Australia Post WooCommerce Extension’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select woocommerce-australian-post.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download woocommerce-australian-post.zip
  2. Extract the woocommerce-australian-post directory to your computer
  3. Upload the woocommerce-australian-post directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
What is API key?

This is a key that you must get it from Australia Post so you can use their API, Get your key from https://developers.auspost.com.au/apis/pacpcs-registration
sections.changelog:
1.10.7 (17.08.2024)

  • Fixed: fixed boxes iterations.

1.10.6 (12.07.2024)

  • Fixed: Adding fixed boxes iterations.
  • Fixed: Adding method description to Australia Post.
  • Added: WordPress 6.6 compatibility.
  • Added: WooCommerce 9.1 compatibility.

1.10.5 (20.05.2024)

  • Fixed: Adding fixed boxes iterations.
  • Added: WordPress 6.5 compatibility.
  • Added: WooCommerce 8.8 compatibility.

1.10.4 (07.01.2024)

  • Added: WordPress 6.4 compatibility.
  • Added: WooCommerce 8.4 compatibility.

1.10.3 (28.09.2023)

  • Fixed: Using the used dimensions of the box instead of the full dimensions.

1.10.2 (12.08.2023)

  • Added: WordPress 6.3 compatibility.
  • Added: WooCommerce 8.0 compatibility.

1.10.1

  • declaring compatibility with WooCommerce High-Performance Order Storage.

1.10.0 (19.05.2023)

  • Added: WordPress 6.2 compatibility.
  • Added: WooCommerce 7.7 compatibility.
  • Fixed: Conflict with other plugins caused by the impersonator composer plugin, PHP scoper is used now.
  • Fixed: Adding fixed boxes iterations.

1.9.10 (19.12.2022)

  • Fixed: set empty weight to zero for box iterations.

1.9.9 (27.10.2022)

  • Fixed: adjust the box packer length iteration.

1.9.8 (17.10.2022)

  • Fixed: adjust the box packer width iteration.

1.9.7 (20.09.2022)

  • Added: WooCommerce 6.9 compatibility.
  • Fixed: validate cubic meters while packing the items.

1.9.6 (12.09.2022)

  • Added: WooCommerce 6.8 compatibility.

1.9.5 (23.07.2022)

  • Added: WooCommerce 6.7 compatibility.

1.9.4 (10.07.2022)

  • Fixed: Set weight limit to 22kg instead of 21kg.
  • Added: WooCommerce 6.6 compatibility.

1.9.3 (25.03.2022)

  • Added: WooCommerce 6.3 compatibility.

1.9.2 (30.01.2022)

  • Added: WordPress 5.9 compatibility.

1.9.1 (05.01.2022)

  • Added: WooCommerce 6.0 compatibility.

1.9.0 (29.11.2021)

  • Added: The ability of Enable/Disable Parcel Post and Express Post services.

1.8.3 (01.05.2021)

  • FIXED: Items with a weight of more than 21kg were causing miscalculations.

1.8.2 (29.03.2021)

  • FIXED: Fix UI issues for the settings page widgets.

1.8.1 (02.08.2020)

  • FIXED: missing libraries’ folder added.

1.8.0 (02.08.2020)

  • ADDED: A new algorithm for packing the cart items to increase the accuracy of the shipping prices.
  • Removed: Legacy shipping methods classes.

1.7.0 (11.03.2020)

  • ADDED: An option for subtract the GST(tax) value (10%) from the shipping prices coming from Australia Post.
  • FIXED: correcting translation keys.

1.6.4

  • FIXED: The plugin should not calculate shipping if one item has a dimension more than 105cm.

1.6.3

  • FIXED: dimensions default to zero if the package is split to more than one package.

1.6.2

  • FIXED: convert all weights to kg to avoid miscalculations.

1.6.1

  • ADDED: WooCommerce 2.6 support tag.

1.6.0

  • FIXED: packing items in different packages based on weight

1.5.9

  • ADDED: WooCommerce support tag

1.5.8

  • ADDED: Sorting shipping rates based on cost.

1.5.7

  • FIXED: PHP Warning at the “australia_post_shipping_rate” hook

1.5.6

  • ADDED: ´australia_post_shipping_rate´ filter for modifying the shipping price.
  • IMPROVED: Code refactoring.

1.5.5

  • ADDED: WooCommerce 3.0+ support.

1.5.4

  • ADDED: listing more new Pro features.

1.5.3

  • REMOVED: invalid settings page URL in the Plugins page.
  • ADDED: support for WordPress 4.6

1.5.2

  • FIXED: PHP warning message at the cart page.

1.5.1

  • ADDED: Compatibility for Legacy shipping methods for WooCommerce less than 2.6

1.5.0

  • ADDED: Compatibility with WooCommerce Shipping Zones which introduced in WC 2.6.0

1.4.4

  • FIXED: calculations for products with high dimensions.

1.4.3

  • Add the new API URL. The old one is withdrawn.

1.4.2

  • Migrating to WPRuby
  • Changing Pro promotion.

1.4.1

  • ADDED: Help and Support links.
  • CHANGED: Pro version links after re-branding.

1.4.0

  • FIXED: Constant PHP conflict with the Pro version.
  • FIXED: UI enhancements.
  • FIXED: Deactivating the Pro version on activation.
  • CHANGED: Adding the new features of the Pro plugin.

1.3.13

  • FIXED: Default weight issue.

1.3.12

  • ADDED: Option to Enable/Disable shipping period on checkout page.

1.3.11

  • FIXED: major rating bug

1.3.10

  • FIXED: warning message issue.

1.3.9

  • FIXED: warning message issue.

1.3.8

  • FIXED: A critical bug

1.3.7

  • FIXED: tax issue
  • FIXED: default dimensions bug

1.3.6

  • FIXED: debug mode bug

1.3.5

  • FIXED: a bug in the dimensions other than ‘cm’

1.3.4

  • FIXED: some bugs
  • ADDED: the “Debug” mode

1.3.3

  • ADDED: the tax status option

1.3.2

  • FIXED: the length bug

1.3.0

  • FIXED: the quantity bug
  • FIXED: other minor bugs

1.1.0

  • ADDED: default packaging options
  • Performance improvments
  • FIXED: some minor bugs

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Australia Post WooCommerce Extension integrates Australia Post with WooCommerce, calculating shipping costs and delivery times for customers.
